name: Pets Cafe - Veggie Fast Food
description:
Here at Veggie Fast Food Pet Cafe we pride ourselves on keeping all our pets healthy and happy. We provide them with lots of fruit and vegetables so they never go hungry.

Come and be apart of our restaurant team and help our fluffy friends get fed, we have house pets like rabbits and mice and also pets from our petting zoo like sheep and cows.

Fill each animals bowl with our specially deigned food pellets and a selection of yummy fruit and vegetables. As you progress though the levels as a trainee chef, new food options will become available, including cool fruit and veg smoothies for the pets to enjoy.


HOW TO PLAY:

Each customers order is displayed on the monitor above their head, pick the correct ingredients for their nutritious and delicious lunch.

Multiple customers can be served at once to speed up service and keep all the hungry animals super happy!

FEATURES:

* Combo up and server multiple hungry herbivores at once.

* Different cute animals to help feed.

* Two different game Modes; Level & Endless.

* Easy to play and great for all ages.

* Perfect for all animal lovers.


Pet Cafe- Veggie Fast Food, animal toys can also be collected in our other game Toy Egg Surprise 2.

Pet Cafe - Veggie Fast Food is totally free and does not contain any in-app purchases or currency of any kind.
